short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get notifications for tasks in Toloka.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Introducing the Toloka Assistant Chrome extension – your ultimate 🛠️ tool for Toloka success! Stay ahead of the game with this nifty extension, keeping you informed about the latest 🆕 tasks available for work on the Toloka platform. 📩 Get notified instantly via Telegram Messenger or 🌐 browser notifications for your bookmarked tasks.

📌 Don't forget! The extension will only send notifications for tasks you've 📑 bookmarked in Toloka. So, be sure to bookmark any tasks you're interested in to seize every opportunity.

With the Toloka Assistant extension, you'll always be up-to-date on the freshest tasks in Toloka, empowering you to act swiftly and 💼 secure work like a pro. Boost your competitiveness in the marketplace and ensure a steady stream of assignments! 🏆💪
